website_summaries.verdict: A heavy-duty inflatable fishing boat that comes with a hard floor to make it as functional as a normal boat.
pros: Comes with a floorboard, which makes an inflatable fishing boat much easier to use
Made from professional grade U.S. Coast Guard approved material
cons: Boat may have a hard time planing with very small motors

customer_reviews.title: That being said it's very easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: I'm a land surveyor and we do work on the water for various projects. We bought this boat for our department for projects on smaller bodies of water. Really convenient to for use to use as we can deflate it and put it in the truck for travel. That being said it's very easy to set up, and now that we've done it a couple times, 1 person can have this inflated and in the water in about 20 minutes. Works great with 2 people in the boat, we use a 55lb thrust electric motor with it. Looking to up grade that to an outboard at some point. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Jolliff

customer_reviews.title: Great experience with Newport vessels
customer_reviews.text: Pretty amazing experience with this company. Despite my vessel being out of warranty , I inquired about a leek that seemed to be a factory flaw and the folks at Newport vessels could not be more helpful and professional. They could have easily hidden behind a recently expired warranty but instead went above and beyond and shipped a new vessel to replace the faulty one free of charge. I don’t know many companies that would do this and I would recommend Newport simply based on their character and integrity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used for a season - Coast Of Maine AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Have been using my 11’ Newport Baja here on the coast of Maine. It’s tied to a dock and I use it as a skiff to my sailboat on a mooring on the coast. I also use it for maintenance, fishing and for setting and pulling 2 lobster traps. This boat is a beast! Seems bulletproof but very roomy and comfortable. I bottom painted it and have no worries leaving it at the dock (secured). Almost passed on this purchase as I didn’t know the name. Well I know it now and it is awesome
customer_reviews.author: Gary F. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Nice Dinghy
customer_reviews.text: Used for the first time with a large group of experienced boaters and each of them commented on the size of the pontoons and its stability. Very sturdy and easy to assemble once you get the hang of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid well made
customer_reviews.text: Really great boat solid ride stable holds air perfectly has been holding up fine my only complaint was one of the oars rivits came out and fell apart mid trip luckily it wasn’t far from my boat, been meaning to email them about it. Besides the oar the boats great I use a 55 lbs Newport engine and it propels me and my girlfriend at around 5mph perfect to get me back and forth to the beach from my boat when we spend the weekends out there.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Get the add on wheel kit to help you move it from truck to shore.
customer_reviews.text: I loved it, the positive reviews were informative and mostly spot on, the video that shows you how to assemble it was helpful. I took the boat out in the sea of Cortez with my 55 trolling motor had two good size guys in the boat and we were out for a half hour. When we got near to the shore the paddles worked great. The two downside Were the weight of the boat a bit to much for just one guy and the first time we put the floor in was a pain in the neck. I’m sure I’ll have a better time with it next time I put it in.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Green

customer_reviews.title: Fun times ahead!
customer_reviews.text: I will spare you the long story and just tell you first the customer service from Newport Vessels is top notch! After their prompt assistance in getting me what I ordered through Amazon, we’ve now had a chance to get our 10’6” Newport out on the lake. Had a great time and extremely pleased with the way our boat handled waves and rough water. The engineering and construction is impressive to me and seems the be reinforced and protected in places that would be most vulnerable to damage. We are extremely pleased with our decision to purchase our Newport!
customer_reviews.author: Roger Dearing

customer_reviews.title: Works great as a shore boat with small outboard
customer_reviews.text: Works great as a shore boat with small outboard. Mounted on the back of my ocean boat on the swimstep.
customer_reviews.author: Brian H.

customer_reviews.title: Waiting to hear back from someone my Catalina came with ...
customer_reviews.text: Waiting to hear back from someone my Catalina came with only one seat and takes on water by the gallon 1400+ After tax and I'm definitely not happy
customer_reviews.author: Brian McKay

customer_reviews.title: Boat as described and quick shipment. Unit fits in Outback 26RKS TT Pass Through
customer_reviews.text: Great packaging and inflated well. Protective boat cover is large enough to recover deflated boat. Nice protective cover for floor boards as well. Not been in the water yet but had a similar unit that I used for 10 years before it failed. Will try out this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Coyle

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup, great packaging, extremely stable.
customer_reviews.text: First impression: this boat is very nice. It Went together in 12 minutes after watching the You tube tutorial made by Newport vessels. I put a 30 lb thrust Minnkota on it and it ran great up to a gps speed of 4.3 kts. 10/10 would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Looks well made. Hard for one person to assemble but not impossible. Should come with two seats.
customer_reviews.author: rexo

customer_reviews.title: Love this boat!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sturdy boat! We used it all summer with a motor to explore beaches in southeast Alaska. The shipping was amazingly fast! Very impressed with this company and quality of boat.
customer_reviews.author: lwrcac

customer_reviews.title: Great boat!
customer_reviews.text: Great inflatable . Works well easy to inflate well made
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: The is amazing. Very well made and is a dream on ...
customer_reviews.text: The is amazing. Very well made and is a dream on the water. I have a 20hp Yamaha on it and it has lots of power and plains quickly. The customer support is awesome too. I need the documents to register the boat and they overnighted them to me for a small fee.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: That's a negative.
customer_reviews.text: Great value and certainly well put together. I've inflated it but am yet to put it to use but feel sure it will do a great job as tender. I've had it a while now yet it still hasn't been used. The seams have come apart and even the paddles have fallen apart. This was our safety boat, but there's no way we can use it for anything. Total junk.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Newport Inflatable Boat - the best combination of the price and the quality.
customer_reviews.text: Another pleasurable transaction with Amazon. The boat exceeded all the expectation. After I checked how to assemble and disassemble it on Youtube [...], it took 15 min for 2 to fully assemble and less then 10 min to pack. The boat is very strong, functional, and reliable. We were fishing bass and just diving from the boat on lake George and had a lot of fun. We took 7 years old niece and she was very happy. This boat is great for 4, but even 6 should be fine. Also the price is the best on the market. I do recommend this boat after my first season. Customer service is great and delivery was within a week.
customer_reviews.author: Andrewry2k

customer_reviews.title: DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY ON MORE EXPENSIVE BRANDS !!!
customer_reviews.text: Great Boat and a nice price !! Extremely well made and very durable. Cant wait to hit the sandbar !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Zibby1

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Boat!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality and very good on water. We us a small outboard and it carries four of us comfortably. Two adults and two kids.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Polins

customer_reviews.title: awesome dinghy
customer_reviews.text: very stable, it keeps the user feeling safe from tipping over
customer_reviews.author: Travis Thorsen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value - durable and dependable. Not a cheap knockoff. The real deal.
customer_reviews.author: Joy D

customer_reviews.title: Boat was glue together after one summer is coming apart...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful boat ...but handles an other parts that where glue starting coming apart after one summer of use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up, stable, and excelllent for fishing.
customer_reviews.text: . We love the boat, very stable Use it for fishing on a small lake. The water level was low this year, could not use our big boat, the Newport filled the bill. We have a metal boat, it is less stable, less comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: neil thomas

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We only got to use it once after receiving it. Enjoyed how fast it planned out under power with a 15hp motor.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Nettleton

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy. Very stable
customer_reviews.text: Have used it several times. Very sturdy. Very stable. Much better than my Walker Bay. Holds a lot of weight. I use as a tender for my 40' sailboat.
customer_reviews.author: J. King

customer_reviews.title: Nice dinghy
customer_reviews.text: Nice dingy overall except some finishing details around the seam. Also the marine wood floor is a bit weak. Would be nice of a bit stronger either more thick or reinforced specially the front section. Also the straps to hang the seat looks weak, stretching a lot while seating. This mean you have to be careful while using the dinghy. Knowing that wooden floor weakness I would have bought an aluminum floor.
customer_reviews.author: Le

customer_reviews.title: Lots of space
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very nice dinghy very well built. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking little dinghy but can't get it to plane with a 6 horsepower motor
customer_reviews.author: Kim C.

customer_reviews.title: Great boat, great service
customer_reviews.text: This is my second inflatable, the first was West Marine and after 3 times out the transom began to come apart and had to be repaired. It lasted 3 years and I threw it away. This boat seems much more durable and a much better price. Service is also great, one day turn around for paperwork.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Welton

customer_reviews.title: Really impressed with the quality
customer_reviews.text: The build quality is superb. Time will tell on how it stands up to the ocean environment, but very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ted L.

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is a sharp looking dinghy that performs well. I am happy with my purchase. Customer service is responsive.
customer_reviews.author: John Curran

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well built and would and have referred other people to buy it and they have!
customer_reviews.author: sylvia kennedy

customer_reviews.title: No t happy with investment...get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this investment. The boats transom started to show signs of separating. I didn't feel comfortable placing my expensive motor on it anymore therefore making the boat useless. I also found the wood flooring gets beat up really fast and there are 10+ spots where the paint is chipping off and water has now absorbed into the wood. I don't believe it will be a problem now, but definitely could be in the future. My next boat will have an aluminum flooring or a hard bottom. I will definitely spend the money next time to get a dinghy with upgraded features and welded material, not glued.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong and durable
customer_reviews.text: This boat arrived by ABF instead of UPS. It takes about 15 mins to assemble and is very heavy if wheels arent mounted. The wheels cost seperate, however, you can buy it at boatstogo for half the price than at newport vessels website. Although this boat is very heavy it is also tough as a rock. I felt really safe while i was at the lake with my family. Note that this boat needs at least 10hp to plane two people. 3.5hp will plane one, though gradually. overall great construction and well design.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: inflatable boat
customer_reviews.text: with practice a one man job assembly , I use mine with a 15hp Johnson and it is fast enough for me. Works very well in 6mph current ,I have installed a bow and 2 under seat storage bags that will hold everything I need for a day on the water.
customer_reviews.author: G. Paige

customer_reviews.title: Keys for the last 4 years and it has held up amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Use this boat in the FL. Keys for the last 4 years and it has held up amazing!
customer_reviews.author: David T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Boat
customer_reviews.text: I put a 20hp Honda 15" Shaft outboard on this dinghy and it handles like a dream and doesn't burn any gas at all compared to other boats I had. The boat is strong and sturdy. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: solid boat, great price
customer_reviews.text: I have not used this boat yet, but it looks solid. And for the price I paid on Amazon , $750, you cant beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan kailher

customer_reviews.title: Not bad unless you are using Weaver Davits
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a dinghy to bring along when cruising. I tried mounting the Weaver davits to it and the 'Newport' label is in the way. I (perhaps stupidly) then tried to mount the david pad on top of the label and it just made a horrible mess and eventually pulled off. The other problem with this boat is that the 'bag' it comes with completely disintegrated after 6 months sitting on the deck of my boat. Both straps broke, rips in the bag, it was basically useless. Other than these issues, it's a fun little boat made of high-quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: Musical_Llama

customer_reviews.title: Great Boat
customer_reviews.text: Great little boat . Just right for one man fishing
customer_reviews.author: William Langdon

customer_reviews.title: awsome
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this boat and had a problem when I received it. Amazon took care of it within The next day, excellent on feed back threw them. I now have the Newport vessel and its the greatest inflatable boat I've own. Handles well, easy set up just takes 20 min , good materials on this boat. I'm very happy with boat threw the makers and amazon purchase Affordable ..no need to buy expensive boat give them both a try and you'll be happy. Brought a lot of wonderful times with family and friends I use this to fish,cruise and fun sporting on ocean and bays.
customer_reviews.author: carlos

customer_reviews.title: at this point this boat is useless since after many hours and attempts the wooden floor ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure where to begin but after many attempts by me and others we have been unable to get the wooden floor to go in this boat its just plain impossible and it will just not go in, at this point this boat is useless since after many hours and attempts the wooden floor will just not snap in and it will actually pop up in the front if you try and push the last 2 floor pieces in the back. to say that I'm disappointed is an understatement.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Great boat! Bought this for my son and many ...
customer_reviews.text: Great boat! Bought this for my son and many of the folks at the marina are appreciative of the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Well built!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet but well built and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Moschberger

customer_reviews.title: awesome  boat
customer_reviews.text: I pull a travel trailer so it's perfect for limited cargo space. very stable boat, I put a 18 horse motor on it and it handles great with the whole family. I tried an aluminum boat but it was to unstable for kids. Love this boat.
customer_reviews.author: dm363

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Adorable little boat for the money. Very nice for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory S. Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Great product however no registration.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the boat but was disappointed because the registration did not come with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great construction. the inflate valves could be better if they one valves.
customer_reviews.author: ernie

customer_reviews.title: New Tender at a Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Boat looks great. Easy to put together. Can't wait to get out on the water. Boat will be used as a tender for my sailboat in SF Bay.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great boat, i use it to cruise in the marina
customer_reviews.author: gwi

customer_reviews.title: Handles fell off
customer_reviews.text: Purchase the dingy Nov 16, 2013. Finally got the dingy to my Bahamas home in Feb of 2012. Put the Dinghy together June 2012. Used the dingy twice and left it out in the sun on the sand. Handles fell off by themselves around July 2013.
customer_reviews.author: Live Love Laugh

customer_reviews.title: Rubber boat
customer_reviews.text: Nice boat , will be reviewing after i get it wet a few times
customer_reviews.author: jan dewitt

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Way way to small sent it back and got a 12' Catalina
customer_reviews.author: Brian McKay

product_meta.title: Newport Vessels 20M1000017 8-Feet 10-Inch Dana Inflatable Sport Tender Dinghy Boat - USCG Rated (White/Gray)
product_meta.description: Style Name:8-Feet 10-InchThe Newport Vessels Dana is one of the best performing inflatable sport boats on the market. Designed with 3 independent air tubes, plus an inflatable keel, made from the highest quality 1100D PVC fabric available, heat welded seams, and a marine wood floor; it’s no wonder the Dana is one of the highest rated and best selling tenders on the market. This 8’10” sport boat performs great with up to a 9.9hp outboard motor, and carries up to 3 people. It is capable of 20+ mph with performance handling unseen in other sport boats. When it’s time to head home, simply deflate and pack the boat back into it’s carrying bag, toss it in your trunk, and drive off. The Dana is an incredibly compact, portable and storable boat when deflated for storage. All of our products come with our 30-Day, Float Your Boat Guarantee, so you can buy with confidence! Our boats come with a 2 year manufacturer's warranty, and we stand behind our products 100%. For complimentary registration documents, contact Newport Vessels with your receipt after purchase to request the documents, mailed same day free of charge. Boat registration laws vary by state, check with your nearest DMV for local regulations.
feature_bullets: 30-Day Guarantee: All of our boats come with our Float Your Boat Guarantee and 2 year manufacturer warranty. California based customer service team for reliable after sale support.
Premium Quality Materials: Newport Vessels Dana is made with US Coast Guard rated 3x layer .9mm/1100D UV Coated PVC, and heat welded seams. Features durable marine wood floors with aluminum framing.

Features: Air keel for easy planing. Sturdy carrying handles, 3 stainless steel bow D-rings for towing your tender, additional topside D-rings for Bimini and accessories, self bailing drain plug, Marine plywood transom mount, and Easy-Reach Grab Rope.
Included: PVC Hull, Wood/Aluminum Floors Panels, 1x Aluminum Bench Seat, 2x Aluminum Oars, Carrying Bag, and Foot Pump
Performance/ Specs: Inflatable V-Shaped Keel for easy planing, 18” tubes for great stability while turning. Can hold a 10hp engine, achieve 20+ mph top speed depending on conditions.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars138 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
